channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report E-2023030320
item.description:
Report E-2023030320

Identified by scraper @ 2023-06-10T21:07:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-03-03
  • City: ALTS DE CALDAS
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN SAN JUAN, PUERTO RICO, INVOICE SEARCH WAS BEING CONDUCTED ON A WORLDWIDE EXPEDITED SERVICE PACKAGE PICKED UP IN PUERTO RICO AND DESTINED FOR GERMANY. OUTER BOX DID NOT HAVE AN INVOICE AND DID NOT HAVE ANY DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS INDICATING A DANGEROUS GOOD WAS BEING SHIPPED. INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS REVEALED AN INNER BOX MARKED AS UN3480 LITHIUM ION BATTERIES WITH A CLASS 9 LITHIUM BATTERY DIAMOND LABEL. INSIDE THE INNER MARKED BOX IS A CLAIM FORM AND RETURN NOTICE ALONG WITH A DENTSPLY SIRONA POWER PACKAGE LITHIUM ION RECHARGEABLE BATTERY. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report I-2022120379
item.description:
Report I-2022120379

Identified by scraper @ 2023-06-10T21:07:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-11-14
  • City: CAMUY
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: YRC INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PALES WERE STACKED ONA SKID AND BANDED. ONE OF THE BANDS BROKE EITHER IN TRANSIT OR WHILE UNLOADING. THIS CAUSED THE PALES TO LEAK. THE RELEASE WAS PROPERLY MANAGED BY AN EMERGENCY RESPONSE TEAM. THE PAILS WERE PLACED INTO SALVAGE DRUMS AND ARE BEING HELD PENDING DISPOSITION FROM THE SHIPPER

item.title: Report E-2022110520
item.description:
Report E-2022110520

Identified by scraper @ 2023-06-10T21:07:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-10-31
  • City: SAN JUAN
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DURING PACKAGE INSPECTION FOR DOCUMENTATION AT THE UPS FACILITY IN SAN JUAN, PUERTO RICO, ASSORTED ROUNDS OF AMMUNITION WAS DISCOVERED. THERMAL LABEL DESCRIBES CONTENTS AS CAR PARTS. INVOICE NOT FOUND DURING INSPECTION. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS OR DANGEROUS GOODS PAPERWORK ON THE OUTER BOX.

  • Description: On 07/25/2022 shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the DHL SJU service station, 30 Central Sector Rd Caribbean Airport Fac, Carolina, PR 00979. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1266 Perfumery products Class 3 Single Package or Inner Packaging (if any): Packaging Type: Bottle Material of Construction: Glass Package Capacity: 100 ml Amount in Package: 100 ml Number in Shipment: 2
